title: Anwar Arena
description: Welcome to Anwar Arena, your premier destination for unforgettable events and celebrations. Our state-of-the-art sports and event facility combines modern amenities with versatile spaces, perfect for weddings, corporate events, sports tournaments, and special occasions. With professional-grade facilities and comprehensive event services, we transform your vision into reality.

keyFeatures.title: Multi-Purpose Sports Arena
keyFeatures.description: Professional-grade sports courts suitable for basketball, badminton, volleyball, and indoor football with proper lighting and ventilation.

keyFeatures.title: Event Hall
keyFeatures.description: Elegant event space perfect for weddings, receptions, corporate events, and celebrations with capacity for up to 200 guests.

keyFeatures.title: Professional Audio/Visual
keyFeatures.description: State-of-the-art sound system, professional lighting, and AV equipment for events and sports broadcasting.

keyFeatures.title: Climate Control
keyFeatures.description: Advanced HVAC system ensuring optimal temperature and air quality throughout all facilities.

keyFeatures.title: Catering Facilities
keyFeatures.description: Professional kitchen and catering services available for events with customizable menu options.

keyFeatures.title: Ample Parking
keyFeatures.description: Spacious parking area accommodating over 50 vehicles with easy access to all facilities.
